#13- Food contact surfaces not sanitized and potential cross contamination. Cooked chicken stored in reused raw chicken boxes. Remove improperly stored chicken from sale and service.- As it was improperly cooled in greater than 2 inches.
#16- Improper cooling of TCS foods. Foods with rice and eggs and chicken and cooked vegetables cooled greater than 2 inches in refrigeration and at room temperature.
